item.title: Nimja
item.description: Nimja is a compiled, type safe and fast templating engine written in Nim. It looks like python’s jinja2 or PHP’s twig, but in contrast to them, it is fully compiled and type safe, since it compiles down to Nim. All the heavy lifting is done on compile time, and the resulting binary contains idiomatic Nim that is very fast on runtime. # nimble install nimja import nimja proc renderStuff(): string = compileTemplateStr(""" {% extends partials/_master.
